rows.label: qst630205_msg0001
rows.name:
Can it be...?
Is the hat ready?

rows.label: qst630205_msg0003
rows.name:
Come on, let me see it!
I gotta see with my own eyes!

rows.label: qst630205_msg0004
rows.name:
Well? Give it to me straight. Am I 
slaying in this hat or what?

rows.label: qst630205_msg0005
rows.name: What do you think about Rugena's hat?

rows.label: qst630205_msg0102
rows.name: I think I might be a little bit in love.

rows.label: qst630205_msg0202
rows.name: And here I thought it was pretty great...

rows.label: qst630205_msg0203
rows.name:
What?
You wanna try for another one?

rows.label: qst630205_msg0301
rows.name:
It's cool, I can wear this while I go
shopping with my girlfriends. Oh yeah,
they are gonna gag with envy, here.

rows.label: qst630205_msg0302
rows.name:
I always thought my old man was a
weird kook, but he did find competent
help, I'll give him that.

rows.label: qst630205_msg0303
rows.name:
Oh, yeah, you want your reward now?
That way you won't have to talk to
that weirdo again. You're welcome.

rows.label: qst630205_msg0304
rows.name:
What? You think that's too much?
Ah, don't mention it. There's plenty
more where that came from.

rows.label: qst630205_msg0305
rows.name:
By which I mean my old man's coffers.
And anyway, you did a good job here.
Thanks!
